definition: variant of 參與|参与[can1 yu4]
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: It is a pity that you missed the party.
sentences.chinese: 你未能參預聚會，真是缺憾。

sentences.english: One in ten are expected to take part in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 預計每十私人就有一個要來參預這次競爭。
